extendedInfo.description: SilverWeight is an app made to be your personal body diary. SilverWeight create for you to keep track of your body so you can see and track your progress whether you want to loose weight or gain it. With SilverWeight you can enter your measurements, weight, calories you've eaten and also take a picture of yourself which makes it easier for yourself to see that you've actually made some progress towards your goal. SilverWeight also comes with the features of writing notes for any day you want to record if something special happened that day, like you where at a party and ate to much, you had the flu, you where very stressed or anything you can think of that might have an affect on your body. This so that you later when looking at your progress in the graph view can see how something happened with your weight or other measurements and go back to see what could have made this.What you get:- Easy data entry- Scrollable, zoomable chart- BMI- Weight goal- BMR- TDEE- Body mass percentage- Statistics- Camera function to view your daily progress

reviews.title: Gray screen. Not happy.
reviews.comment: I purchased the full version and when I ask it to display all the statistics, it rotates the screen but just gives me a blank gray screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost data
reviews.comment: I saw the comments about data being lost, but I saw that a bug had been fixed also.  I went ahead and downloaded the program, and sure enough, I lost all my data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great potential, needs further development
reviews.comment: I needed something to keep track of my measurements and weight, which this does just fine.  I decided to pay for the full app to get benefit of the chart , body fat calculation, etc. These functions are not good, the chart is poorly designed and then body fat % is calculating incorrectly - it says I have a body fat % of 62 when my BMI is 25... obvious bugs need to be sorted out, I\'m a little disappointed I paid for this :(
reviews.author: Angela Richards

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Like other people said, I plugged in all t The measurements, but when I went back later, they were all gone. Don\'t even waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sad
reviews.comment: Great concept, bad app, too many flaws to be released into public!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: Mad that I actually paod for this app. Nothing works right. My preferences never save. The ankle and calf measurements don\'t record properly and the statistics/graphing is lacking. Do not spend money on this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UI is great
reviews.comment: But its useless if it doesnt save the data we enter, i went back to the previous day, no data  Also, if u could add a calender showing the dates that has records  One more thing, i tried to buy it, but it force closes whenever i press the button  Sorry, but needs some more work to get a desent rating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I have entered my info twice. It keeps clearing everything.  Worst app I have ever tried.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost data
reviews.comment: Closed and lost all measurements. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not cool
reviews.comment: I took my time to enter all the measurements and then I closed it reopened it and all the info was gone this was a waste of time I am uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Everything is not free. Not worth downloading.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FC message
reviews.comment: And the app wasn\'t open. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice concept, but need more improvement.
reviews.comment: I like the idea of this app, but I found that it is quite buggy and feel like it is unfinished. The data input box is hard to locate because it is packed too tight. The camera function does not work on my Xperia Mini (force quit after photo was taken) and did not store any photo. I hope the developers will fix and improve it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.comment: Can\'t input some settings. Text is white. Only in landscape mode. Uninstall
reviews.author: Karl Slater
